bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition with sounds in one’s brain as its major sign. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry ming 茗 quoting Yi fang zhai yao 醫方摘要 : 頭內有蟲蛀響聲，名天白蟻。用茶子細末，吹入鼻中，效 , “If in the head there is a ringing sound of insects boring, this is called ‘heaven’s termite’. Prepare a fine powder from cha zi and blow this into the nose. Effective”, writes: 頭腦鳴響：狀如蟲蛀，名大白蟻 , “Sounds in one’s brain as if there were insects boring is called ‘ big termites ’”. The term 大白蟻 , “big termites”, may simply be an erroneous writing of tian bai yi 天白蟻 , “heaven’s termite”.
